description: Try our easy to follow Chicken & Cheese Quesadillas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken & Cheese Quesadillas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tsp of the oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Place a quesadilla in the pan and press down firmly. Cook for about 1 minute or until golden. Brush top side with oil, then carefully turn over and cook for 1 minute. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm. Repeat for remaining quesadillas. Cut into quarters to serve.
